name: Karlson Level Editor Mod
description:
A level editor mod for Dani's Karlson Demo. It adds the ability to create your own levels and share them online for others to play!

The online level sharing is powered by Mod.io, which is an online level sharing service targeted mostly towards indie devs.

Here's a trailer: (WARNING! THIS TRAILER USES SLIGHTLY OUTDATED FOOTAGE, AND THE MOVEMENT SYSTEM WAS NOT ACCURATE TO THE ORIGINAL KARLSON AT THE TIME IT WAS RECORDED. THAT'S WHY THE MOVEMENT IS SO FLOATY IN THE VIDEO. THAT ISSUE HAS SINCE BEEN FIXED.)

Be sure to check out this dani-inspired devlog I made for the game:
